jot.math.geometry

Interface Renderable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AABB, AbstractBoundingVolume, AbstractMaterial, BoundingSphere, Material, OBB

    public interface Renderable
    Interface to specify the default methods to implement for each renderable geometry.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isRenderable()
      See if render for this geometry object, is activated or deactivated.
      void setRenderable(boolean renderable)
      Activate or deactivate render for this geometric object, by default render is set to false.

    • Method Detail

      • isRenderable

        boolean isRenderable()
        See if render for this geometry object, is activated or deactivated.
        Returns:
        TRUE if this geometry object is renderable, FALSE otherwise.

      • setRenderable

        void setRenderable(boolean renderable)
        Activate or deactivate render for this geometric object, by default render is set to false.
        Parameters:
        renderable - TRUE if this geometric object should be render, FALSE otherwise.
